welcome.guide_1:
Easy - Create Kanban-boards for personal and team projects.

You can create a board for every project and use it with your colleagues. You will see your boards page after login. It's possible to add a new board with the button 'Create board' in header or on the boards page directly
welcome.guide_2:
Customize - Change board's background for intuitive navigation.

After you create a board you can choose one of 14 amazing backgrounds for it. Just press the settings button on the board that you want to change
welcome.guide_3:
Find - With our end-to-end search you can find tasks even faster.

You can just write whatever you want to find in search field in application header, and so you will get the table with results, which you can sort as you want
welcome.guide_4:
Visual - Create and change tasks, complete projects, meet deadlines.

You can create the different columns in you board, like 'to do', 'in progress', 'done' etc (choose column name by yourself) and then add your task to corresponding column. You can move tasks between columns just with your mouse
welcome.expired: Your token is expired! Please, login
welcome.teamAlla: Deployed application backend. Developed 'all boards' page and 'global search' page. Applied NgRx for 'all boards' page. For listed above pages implemented 2-language localization, user-friendly error-handling, routing, modals for boards creation / editing / deletion. Implemented universal interceptor for all network requests. Additional features - search page sorting, ability to change boards background.
welcome.teamSasha: Configured initial project setup. Held code-review during app developmant. Developed 'board details' page with drag-n-drop. Applied NgRx for 'board details' page. For listed above page implemented 2-language localization, user-friendly error-handling, routing, modals for column / task creation / editing / deletion. Additional features - ability to change board background at details page.
welcome.teamSveta: Responsible for application design. Developed 'sticky' header, footer, home page, login page, sign-up page, user profile page. Applied reactive forms with custom validation while development . For listed above pages implemented 2-language localization, user-friendly error-handling, routing, routing-guard. Implemented user session handling. Additional features - 404 page, user's avatar, password generation.
